Introduction
This topic contains general information on apportionments, including
requirement that claimants submit a prescribed form
who may receive an apportionment of a beneficiary’s benefits
apportioning benefits to a dependent that is not on the beneficiary’s award
regulations under which the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) may apportion benefits
criteria for granting a claim for an apportionment
circumstances under which VA may not apportion a Veteran’s benefits
apportionments as a convenience on the part of beneficiaries
handling a beneficiary’s assertion that a child does not meet the definition of a child under 38 CFR 3.57
restriction on the concurrent payment of education benefits and apportioned benefits
disclosing information in the claims folder to the beneficiary and/or claimant
, and
apportionments involving a beneficiary or claimant that resides in a foreign country
.
title: M21-1, Part VII, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section A - Apportionment Process
citation: Part VII, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section A
